016package io.micronaut.maven;
017
018import java.io.File;
019import java.io.IOException;
020import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
021import java.nio.file.Files;
022import java.nio.file.Path;
023import java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption;
024import java.util.ArrayList;
025import java.util.Collections;
026import java.util.List;
027import java.util.jar.JarEntry;
028import java.util.jar.JarFile;
029import java.util.regex.Pattern;
030import javax.inject.Inject;
031import org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact;
032import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
033import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.LifecyclePhase;
034import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Mojo;
035import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Parameter;
036import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.ResolutionScope;
037import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
038
039/**
040 * Import beans from project dependencies by generating factories annotated with
041 * <code>@Import</code> containing the list of packages.
042 *
043 * @author Auke Schrijnen
044 * @since 4.5.0
045 */
046@Mojo(name = ImportFactoryMojo.MOJO_NAME, defaultPhase = LifecyclePhase.GENERATE_SOURCES, threadSafe = true, requiresDependencyResolution = ResolutionScope.COMPILE_PLUS_RUNTIME)
047public class ImportFactoryMojo extends AbstractMicronautMojo {
048
049  /**
050   * Name of the import factory mojo.
051   */
052  public static final String MOJO_NAME = "generate-import-factory";
053
054  private static final String MICRONAUT_IMPORTFACTORY_PREFIX = "micronaut.importfactory";
055
056  /**
057   * Reference to the Maven project on which the plugin is invoked.
058   */
059  private final MavenProject project;
060
061  /**
062   * Whether to enable or disable the generation of the import factory.
063   *
064   * @since 4.5.0
065   */
066  @Parameter(property = MICRONAUT_IMPORTFACTORY_PREFIX + ".enabled", defaultValue = "false")
067  private boolean enabled;
068
069  /**
070   * The output directory to which all the sources will be generated.
071   *
072   * @since 4.5.0
073   */
074  @Parameter(defaultValue = "${project.build.directory}/generated-sources/importfactory", property = MICRONAUT_IMPORTFACTORY_PREFIX + ".outputDirectory", required = true)
075  private File outputDirectory;
076
077  /**
078   * Add the output directory to the project as a source root in order to let the generated java
079   * classes be compiled and included in the project artifact.
080   *
081   * @since 4.5.0
082   */
083  @Parameter(defaultValue = "true", property = MICRONAUT_IMPORTFACTORY_PREFIX + ".addCompileSourceRoot")
084  private boolean addCompileSourceRoot;
085
086  /**
087   * Regexp pattern which allows including certain dependencies.
088   *
089   * @since 4.5.0
090   */
091  @Parameter(defaultValue = "^.*:.*$", property = MICRONAUT_IMPORTFACTORY_PREFIX + ".includeDependenciesFilter", required = true)
092  private String includeDependenciesFilter;
093
094  /**
095   * Regexp pattern which allows excluding certain dependencies.
096   *
097   * @since 4.5.0
098   */
099  @Parameter(defaultValue = "^$", property = MICRONAUT_IMPORTFACTORY_PREFIX + ".excludeDependenciesFilter", required = true)
100  private String excludeDependenciesFilter;
101
102  /**
103   * Regexp pattern which allows including certain packages.
104   *
105   * @since 4.5.0
106   */
107  @Parameter(defaultValue = "^.*$", property = MICRONAUT_IMPORTFACTORY_PREFIX + ".includePackagesFilter", required = true)
108  private String includePackagesFilter;
109
110  /**
111   * Regexp pattern which allows excluding certain packages.
112   *
113   * @since 4.5.0
114   */
115  @Parameter(defaultValue = "^$", property = MICRONAUT_IMPORTFACTORY_PREFIX + ".excludePackagesFilter", required = true)
116  private String excludePackagesFilter;
117
118  /**
119   * The package name which is used for the generated import factories. When not specified a factory
120   * is generated for each package within that package in order to access package protected fields.
121   *
122   * @since 4.5.0
123   */
124  @Parameter(property = MICRONAUT_IMPORTFACTORY_PREFIX + ".targetPackage")
125  private String targetPackage;
126
127  @Inject
128  public ImportFactoryMojo(MavenProject project) {
129    this.project = project;
130  }
131
132  @Override
133  public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
134    if (!enabled) {
135      getLog().debug(this.getClass().getSimpleName() + " is disabled");
136      return;
137    }
138
139    if (addCompileSourceRoot) {
140      project.addCompileSourceRoot(outputDirectory.getPath());
141    }
142
143    List<Artifact> dependencies = getFilteredDependencies();
144
145    if (dependencies.isEmpty()) {
146      getLog().warn("No matching dependencies.");
147      return;
148    }
149
150    getLog().info("Found " + dependencies.size() + " matching dependencies:");
151    dependencies.forEach(
152        dependency -> getLog().info(getIdentifier(dependency) + " at " + dependency.getFile()));
153
154    List<String> packages = getFilteredPackages(dependencies);
155
156    if (packages.isEmpty()) {
157      getLog().warn("No matching packages.");
158      return;
159    }
160
161    getLog().info("Found " + packages.size() + " matching packages:");
162    packages.forEach(getLog()::info);
163
164    if (targetPackage == null || targetPackage.isEmpty()) {
165      for (String packageName : packages) {
166        try {
167          generateImportFactory(packageName, Collections.singletonList(packageName));
168        } catch (IOException e) {
169          throw new MojoExecutionException("Error creating factory for " + packageName, e);
170        }
171      }
172    } else {
173      try {
174        generateImportFactory(targetPackage, packages);
175      } catch (IOException e) {
176        throw new MojoExecutionException("Error creating factory for " + targetPackage, e);
177      }
178    }
179  }
180
181  /**
182   * Get the list of matching packages from the given list of dependencies.
183   *
184   * @param dependencies the Maven dependencies
185   * @return a list of matching packages
186   * @throws MojoExecutionException when the artifacts can't be read
187   */
188  private List<String> getFilteredPackages(List<Artifact> dependencies)
189      throws MojoExecutionException {
190    List<String> packages = new ArrayList<>();
191    for (Artifact dependency : dependencies) {
192      packages.addAll(getPackages(dependency));
193    }
194
195    Pattern includePackages = Pattern.compile(includePackagesFilter);
196    Pattern excludePackages = Pattern.compile(excludePackagesFilter);
197
198    return packages.stream().filter(includePackages.asMatchPredicate())
199        .filter(excludePackages.asMatchPredicate().negate()).sorted().toList();
200  }
201
202  /**
203   * Get the list of matching dependencies.
204   *
205   * @return the matching dependencies
206   */
207  private List<Artifact> getFilteredDependencies() {
208    Pattern includeDependency = Pattern.compile(includeDependenciesFilter);
209    Pattern excludeDependency = Pattern.compile(excludeDependenciesFilter);
210
211    return project.getArtifacts().stream()
212        .filter(dependency -> includeDependency.matcher(getIdentifier(dependency)).matches())
213        .filter(dependency -> !excludeDependency.matcher(getIdentifier(dependency)).matches())
214        .toList();
215  }
216
217  /**
218   * Get the packages from the given artifact.
219   *
220   * @param artifact the Maven artifact
221   * @return the list of packages
222   * @throws MojoExecutionException when the artifacts can't be read
223   */
224  private List<String> getPackages(Artifact artifact) throws MojoExecutionException {
225    try (JarFile file = new JarFile(artifact.getFile(), false)) {
226      return file.stream()
227          .filter(entry -> entry.getName().endsWith(".class") && entry.getName().contains("/"))
228          .map(this::getPackageName).distinct().sorted().toList();
229    } catch (IOException e) {
230      throw new MojoExecutionException("Unable to read " + artifact.getFile(), e);
231    }
232  }
233
234  /**
235   * Get the identifier for the given Maven artifact.
236   *
237   * @param artifact the Maven artifact
238   * @return the identifier for the artifact
239   */
240  private String getIdentifier(Artifact artifact) {
241    return artifact.getGroupId() + ":" + artifact.getArtifactId();
242  }
243
244  /**
245   * Get the Java package name from the given Jar entry.
246   *
247   * @param entry the Jar entry
248   * @return the Java package name
249   */
250  private String getPackageName(JarEntry entry) {
251    String entryName = entry.getName();
252    // remove .class from the end and change format to use periods instead of forward slashes
253    return entryName.substring(0, entryName.lastIndexOf('/')).replace('/', '.');
254  }
255
256  /**
257   * Generate the import factory with the given packages in the given package.
258   *
259   * @param packageName the package in which the factory is generated
260   * @param packages    the list of the packages which are imported
261   * @throws IOException when the writing of the factory class fails
262   */
263  private void generateImportFactory(String packageName, List<String> packages) throws IOException {
264    Path factoryPath = outputDirectory.toPath().resolve(packageName.replace('.', '/'))
265        .resolve("ImportFactory.java");
266
267    List<String> code = new ArrayList<>();
268    code.add("package " + packageName + ";");
269    code.add("");
270    code.add("import io.micronaut.context.annotation.Factory;");
271    code.add("import io.micronaut.context.annotation.Import;");
272    code.add("import jakarta.annotation.Generated;");
273    code.add("");
274    code.add("/** Factory which allows Micronaut to import beans from the specified packages. */");
275    code.add("@Generated(\"io.micronaut.maven:micronaut-maven-plugin\")");
276    code.add("@Factory");
277    code.add("@Import(");
278    code.add("    packages = {");
279    for (String name : packages) {
280      code.add("      \"" + name + "\",");
281    }
282    code.add("    })");
283    code.add("public class ImportFactory {}\n");
284
285    Files.createDirectories(factoryPath.getParent());
286    Files.write(factoryPath, code, StandardCharsets.UTF_8, StandardOpenOption.CREATE,
287        StandardOpenOption.TRUNCATE_EXISTING);
288  }
289
290}
